subject: Baseball
lead_paragraph: Greg Maddux, a four-time Cy Young Award winner, will announce his retirement Monday at the winter meetings, his agent, Scott Boras, confirmed. Maddux, who turns 43 in April, ranks eighth on the career wins list with 355. He went 8-13 with a 4.22 earned run average last season with the Padres and the Dodgers.
